messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Hi everyone! New and thinking about Unschooling.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/8/2004 11:04:38 AM Eastern Standard Time, kutensassykat@yahoo.com writes: Hi everyone! Im Kelly, 24 yrs old, sahm to Lilliana who is  4
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/8/2004 11:04:38 AM Eastern Standard Time,
kutensassykat@... writes:




Hi everyone! Im Kelly, 24 yrs old, sahm to Lilliana who is 4 almost 5
(x-mas day) she would be starting kindergarden next year, if I wanted
her to go to a public school that is. But I dont, and I have made the
decision that she will be homeschooled no matter what. But the more I
learn about unschooling, the more I love it! I think that its right
up our alley. I mean, isnt that basically what we do with the kids
when they are younger, before school age? So I mean, I got this down
pact! lol Now Im trying to figure out the laws here in SC. Being new
to all of this the laws can be over-whelming and confusing! But Im
glad that I have started all this research now!
Anyways, Im glad that I was invited (thanks Ren!) and joined this
group! I look forward to all the info that is shared here!!!


Hi, Kelly! I'm Kelly in Columbia. You're in luck! There's an ACTIVE
unschooling group in Greenville! I hope I'll see you in Charlotte on Saturday!

We'll talk then!

~Kelly, listowner

Dana

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Hi everyone! New and thinking about Unschooling.
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kelly!  Welcome to the group. If you don t mind, where in SC are you?  I am in Beaufort.  It  seems like most of the unschoolers are upstate and some in
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kelly! Welcome to the group.

If you don't mind, where in SC are you? I am in Beaufort. It seems like
most of the unschoolers are upstate and some in Columbia.

Do you know about the Live and Learn Conference in Charlotte this Saturday?
It might be a great intro. to unschooling for you.

Leslie in SC

messages.subject: Hi everyone! New and thinking about Unschooling.
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! Im Kelly, 24 yrs old, sahm to Lilliana who is 4 almost 5 (x-mas day) she would be starting kindergarden next year, if I wanted her to go to a
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone! Im Kelly, 24 yrs old, sahm to Lilliana who is 4 almost 5
(x-mas day) she would be starting kindergarden next year, if I wanted
her to go to a public school that is. But I dont, and I have made the
decision that she will be homeschooled no matter what. But the more I
learn about unschooling, the more I love it! I think that its right
up our alley. I mean, isnt that basically what we do with the kids
when they are younger, before school age? So I mean, I got this down
pact! lol Now Im trying to figure out the laws here in SC. Being new
to all of this the laws can be over-whelming and confusing! But Im
glad that I have started all this research now!
Anyways, Im glad that I was invited (thanks Ren!) and joined this
group! I look forward to all the info that is shared here!!!

Kelly
